alert.note: Alert for Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 12 at 8:21PM AKST until November 13 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches for the Klondike Highway. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...The Klondike Highway above 2000 feet. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Uncertainty in snow totals exists as strong S advection could cause temperatures to warm through the day, resulting in lesser snow totals. On the other hand, if rates prove sufficiently heavy, temperatures could remain low enough to result in greater amounts.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
